interface.name: io_elementary_pantheon_blur_manager_v1
interface.description: This protocol provides a way for Pantheon applications to ask for background blur.

request.name: get_blur
request.description: Get blur object for the given wl_surface to blur background behind it. If the given wl_surface already has a io_elementary_pantheon_blur_v1 object associated, an error will be raised.

interface.name: io_elementary_pantheon_blur_v1
interface.description: This interface provides a way for Pantheon applications to specify region of the window to be blurred. By default the region to blur is considered to be null.

request.name: set_region
request.description: Tell the window manager to crop blur to a given region. The coordinates must be relative to the associated surface.
